ygData.subject: Re: Battle Tactics (The untouchable wizard)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I ve been trying to find the spell Enstill with no luck. Can you tell me where i can find that spell ? Thanks much !! ... From: Tyson Schoepflin
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

I've been trying to find the spell Enstill with no luck. Can you tell me
where i can find that spell ?

Thanks much !!

-----Original Message-----
From: Tyson Schoepflin <schoty@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 20, 1999 11:04 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Battle Tactics (The untouchable wizard)


>From: "Tyson Schoepflin" <schoty@...>
>
>Hello all,
>
>I have a 21st Lvl Dark Elf Wizard. I've fought many places with many
different people and
>here is some of what works and doesn't work...
>
>As for solo battle tactics the only thing I can say it NOT to be touched by
the enemy. As
>soon as they get up to you, it is very difficult to unload your mana on it.
I tend to get
>as far as I can from the baddie and then cast lighting bolt as my first DD
spell. I've noticed
>that a lot of the time Force Shock is reisisted (grumble grumble). Then it
is a toss up to enstill
>them or "nuke" them again. Either way seems to work well and hopefully they
are dead. If they
>do manage to get up to me. I use shock of lightning, even if the baddie
hits me I usually regain
>consentration ( If the baddie cons as a blue. Whites and higher hit hard
enough that you rarely
>regain consentration). Also if you are looking for killer exp for soloing
I've found that it the best
>exp movement on my bar is found in the elements. (Think it over. :-) )
>
>Grouping can be hard for a wizard. There are not many tells, "Looking for a
wizard for group!"
>I've spent 20 min at a time in Cazic 'Thule asking if any group needs a
wizard. Just about any
>other class that asks gets a group. But once in a group things can go
well. The main thing I have
>noticed is when your party pulls something I can cast a DD 83 - 125 damage
spell and the mob will
>NOT turn and come to me. It is always the first thing I do. I'll usually
then sit and med the mana back from
>that blast. As long as you hit the mob from time to time you will be fine.
But if you unload your mana like
>a crazy manic your party will not beable to get the mob off you even with
the most furious taunting skills.
>
>In a place like Cazic 'Thule I tend to use my level 12 and 16 spells
(Execpt for Enstill) to do the damage.
>The lizards just seem to resist the higher level spells at the moment.
>
>Well hope you found this helpful in this sea of crazy info.
>Take Care. If you ever want to share some languages look me up on the
Mithaniel Marr Server.
>
>Venlaan
>21st DE Wizzy.
>
>P.S.
>
>Can anyone verify what I saw in Kedge Keep. I went in there just to go
there and scope it out. I saw
>no lvl 31st Sword Fish guarding entrance and inside (though I dared not to
venture far) I saw no life
>of any sort. Have they not put in the mobs for that area???!!!
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
